content: I don't have personal beliefs or opinions. however, it's difficult to predict the future of football in russia, as it depends on various factors. nonetheless, the premier league's popularity across the world and its impressive track record over the years make it likely that its influence will continue to grow in russia. still, it's important to note that other leagues, such as la liga in spain and bundesliga in germany, also have a significant following in russia. additionally, the russian premier league is also growing in popularity, and with the event of the 2018 fifa world cup being hosted in russia, there has been an increase in interest in football, both locally and abroad. therefore, it's fair to assume that the growth and popularity of football in russia will be influenced by a combination of several factors, including successful performances by russian teams, investments in grassroots football and other major events.
